#summary TextHTML, HTML support

= Valid HTML =

Note: It implements just a limited number of tags and options. HTML is pretty "strict", you can't use quotes for the values: {{{<font size="20">}}} is "incorrect", you should type {{{<font size=20>}}}. Neither you can include additional spaces inside the tags: {{{<font color= #ffff00>}}} is "incorrect", you should use {{{<font color=#ffff00>}}}. The component doesn't support images yet.

* {{{<font ...> ... </font>}}}

  options:

  * size=...
    font size (in pixels)

  * color=#rrggbb 
    Hex (RGB) color

  * name=... 
    font name
  
* {{{<a href=...> ... </a>}}}

  "link" or id returned when a link is clicked 

* {{{<i> ... </i>}}}

  Italic font

* {{{<b> ... </b>}}}

  Bold font

* {{{<p align=...> ... </p>}}}

  options:

  * left
  * right
  * center
  * justify

* <br>

* Special chars:

  &quot;  ---> "

  &nbsp;  ---> non-breaking space

  &lt;    ---> <

  &gt;    ---> >

  &euro;  ---> â‚¬

  &amp;   ---> &
